description:
Take the fuss out of carrying water with this lightweight and innovative reservoir. The 3D bottom and shape-loc baffles keep its shape and the soft grab handle makes filling a sinch, keeping you connected to the journey.

  • Made of durable TPU with RF welded seams that are 100% BPA and PVC free for peace of mind on the trail
  • Plug-N-Play® connect system to disconnect the tube for super easy refills
  • Comet™ self-sealing bite valve and magnetic clip keep you hydrated effortlessly
  • An internal drying tab creates a complete cleaning and drying solution for after your trip
name: Hydrapak Contour 2L Reservoir
